UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides Derived from Fusion Peptides of Influenza A Viruses, a Promising Approach to Designing Potent Antimicrobial Agents.
Literature.Author: Wang J, Zhong W, Lin D, Xia F, Wu W, Zhang H, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cytotoxicity=195.1 µg/ml,Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cytotoxicity=162.0 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=125 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=3.8µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=1.9µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=7.6µM)
